description: preloaded dru module for queueing concepts, teaching them in fifo order, and keeping processed summaries.
activation_scope: apply educator semantics only when module educator is explicitly invoked or activated
constraints: alias groups are transitive and order-independent
no seeded historical/personal data in module bootstrap

command_rows.command_semantic: activate educator deterministic queue/teach/remind workflow rules and module-local alias handling.
store a concept that I want to learn more about
list out all processed queue concepts with a bulletpoint and a one paragraph summary of the concept
take the oldest item from the queued concepts and explain it to me like I am 13 in several paragraphs, and then remove it from the queue
removes both queued and processed rows of {{ concept }} with a confirmation dialog, to make sure it's a correct match
merge two subcommand names into one alias-group; order-independent; resolves aliases transitively and merges behaviors
show alias groups for the module
remove an alias name from its group (command shape: {{ mod }} aliases remove {{ alias }})
confirmation step for remove (command shape: {{ mod }} confirm remove {{ concept }})
